2025 has been kicking my ass so far :D
february 6, 2025

so! 2025! starting a new semester! gonna be fun right!

nevermind

i don't really remember all that great but. i think i just got really pissy and felt like shit and i didnt't think i could be at school
so i did what all reasonable girls do, and went to the nurse!

i woke up like a half hour before school ended, and was told to sit in a conference room. yknow. one of the rooms they have for conferences

and i was able to get all my work done! except for one class

the next day i went to the doctor! apparently i had the Flu! because that's what my mom has

i can't even remember the last 2 and 1/2 weeks all i know is that i was in bed

and then like 2 days ago when i got OUT of bed

so that's been my life for the past month

i still feel like shit, and i can hardly think, but hey! i bumped up geography from a 20% to a 40%! im still failing this class. and all my others. woohoo.

i hope yhou all have been able to sleep the past few nights and also havent thrown up
